content: greet guests with the festive charm of this cute crochet wreath with a mischievous touch stitched in red heart super saver a special guest the crochet raccoon adorns this wreath that s perfect on your door or window practice single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet assembly bobbles color changes working in the round and more it s an entertaining patten that s sure to add a touch of whimsy to your home materials red heart® super saver® 7 oz/198 g 364 yds/333 m contrast a jade 3862 2 balls or 480 yds/439 m contrast b frosty green 0661 1 ball or 30 yds/27 5 m contrast c cherry red 0319 1 ball or 15 yds/14 m contrast d soft white 0316 1 ball or 55 yds/50 m contrast e gray heather 0400 1 ball or 65 yds/59 5 m contrast f black 0312 1 ball or 200 yds/183 m measurements approx 13 wide x 21 long 33 cm wide x 53 5 cm long including raccoon
